title: How do you report a booster?
body: At least, in a way that'll actually get seen. It's really unfair that one high elo player ruins the balance of a potentially fun game, just because one person is too lazy to climb on their own.

replies.body: We have systems that will find boosters, but you can also submit a report via the post-game screen to help us prioritize who we look at.  Thanks for helping to keep the community a safer place!
Thank you for your response. I did send the post game report, so I hope that was enough.
boosting is most time a reason for permaban and if it hits a pro-player something like to money punishments or ban-time for tournaments
